verses.verse: And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> on him, and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H7495>physicians<s%> to <S%H2590>embalm<s%> his <S%H1>father:<s%> and the <S%H7495>physicians<s%> <S%H2590>embalmed<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> were <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> for him; for <S%H3651>so<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of those which are <S%H2590>embalmed:<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H1058>mourned<s%> for him three <S%H7657>score<s%> and ten <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And when the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H1086>mourning<s%> were <S%H5674>past,<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H1696>speak,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

My <S%H1>father<s%> made me <S%H7650>swear,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>See,<s%> I <S%H4191>die:<s%> in my <S%H6913>grave<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H3738>dig<s%> for me in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> shall you <S%H6912>bury<s%> me. <S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore let me <S%H5927>go<s%> up, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, and <S%H6912>bury<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and I will <S%H7725>come<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5927>Go<s%> up, and <S%H6912>bury<s%> your <S%H1>father,<s%> according as he made you <S%H7650>swear.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to <S%H6912>bury<s%> his <S%H1>father:<s%> and with him <S%H5927>went<s%> up <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house:<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> their <S%H2945>little<s%> ones, and their <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> and their <S%H1241>herds,<s%> they <S%H5800>left<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen.<s%>
And there <S%H5927>went<s%> up with him <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen:<s%> and it was a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>great<s%> <S%H4264>company.<s%>

And they <S%H935>came<s%> to the threshing <S%H1637>floor<s%> of <S%H329>Atad,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H5594>mourned<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>sore<s%> <S%H4553>lamentation:<s%> and he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H60>mourning<s%> for his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And when the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H60>mourning<s%> in the <S%H1637>floor<s%> of <S%H329>Atad,<s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is a <S%H3515>grievous<s%> <S%H60>mourning<s%> to the <S%H4714>Egyptians:<s%> <S%H5921>why<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of it was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H67>Abelmizraim,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>
And his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to him <S%H3651>according<s%> as he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them:

For his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5375>carried<s%> him into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4375>Machpelah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> with the <S%H7704>field<s%> for a <S%H272>possession<s%> of a burial <S%H6913>plot<s%> of <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H4471>Mamre.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> he, and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H5927>went<s%> up with him to <S%H6912>bury<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he had <S%H6912>buried<s%> his <S%H1>father.<s%>

And when <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that their <S%H1>father<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> will <S%H3863>peradventure<s%> <S%H7852>hate<s%> us, and will certainly <S%H7725>requite<s%> us <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we <S%H1580>did<s%> to him.
And they sent a <S%H6680>messenger<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Your <S%H1>father<s%> did <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> he <S%H4194>died,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>So<s%> shall you <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H5375>Forgive,<s%> I <S%H577>pray<s%> you <S%H4994>now,<s%> the <S%H6588>trespass<s%> of your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and their <S%H2403>sin;<s%> for they <S%H1580>did<s%> to you <S%H7451>evil:<s%> and <S%H4994>now,<s%> we <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H5375>forgive<s%> the <S%H6588>trespass<s%> of the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>father.<s%> And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> when they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him.

And his <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> down before his <S%H6440>face;<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> we be your <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> not: for am I in the place of <S%H430>God?<s%>

But as for you, you <S%H2803>thought<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me; but <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2803>meant<s%> it to <S%H2896>good,<s%> to <S%H6213>bring<s%> to <S%H6213>pass,<s%> as it is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H2421>save<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2421>alive.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H3372>fear<s%> you not: I will <S%H3557>nourish<s%> you, and your <S%H2945>little<s%> ones. And he <S%H5162>comforted<s%> them, and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H5921>kindly<s%> <S%H3820><s%> to them.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> he, and his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house:<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim's<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H8029>third<s%> generation: the <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> were <S%H3205>brought<s%> up on <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H1290>knees.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> I <S%H4191>die:<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> will surely <S%H6485>visit<s%> you, and <S%H5927>bring<s%> you out of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> took an <S%H7650>oath<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> will surely <S%H6485>visit<s%> you, and you shall <S%H5927>carry<s%> up my <S%H6106>bones<s%> from <S%H2088>hence.<s%>

So <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> being an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old:<s%> and they <S%H2590>embalmed<s%> him, and he was <S%H3455>put<s%> in a <S%H727>coffin<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
